description_en: The EPF Dividend Rates dataset provides annual dividend percentages for the Employees Provident Fund (EPF) in Malaysia. It includes data for Simpanan Konvensional from 1952 and Simpanan Shariah from 2017, with each entry detailing the year, the conventional dividend rate, and the shariah dividend rate.
description_ms: Dataset Kadar Dividen KWSP menyediakan peratusan dividen tahunan untuk Kumpulan Wang Simpanan Pekerja (KWSP) di Malaysia. Ia merangkumi data untuk Simpanan Konvensional dari 1952 dan Simpanan Shariah dari 2017, dengan setiap entri memaparkan tahun, kadar dividen konvensional, dan kadar dividen shariah.
methodology_en: The dataset compiles annual dividend rates declared by the Employees Provident Fund (EPF) for both Simpanan Konvensional and Simpanan Shariah. The rates are officially announced by EPF based on the fund's annual financial performance and are applicable to all members' savings. Data is gathered from official EPF announcements and historical records.
methodology_ms: Dataset ini mengumpulkan kadar dividen tahunan yang diumumkan oleh Kumpulan Wang Simpanan Pekerja (KWSP) untuk Simpanan Konvensional dan Simpanan Shariah. Kadar ini diumumkan secara rasmi oleh KWSP berdasarkan prestasi kewangan tahunan dana dan terpakai kepada semua simpanan ahli. Data dikumpulkan daripada pengumuman rasmi KWSP dan rekod sejarah.
caveat_en: The dataset only includes dividend rates declared by EPF and does not account for any individual account variations due to additional contributions or withdrawals. Simpanan Shariah data is only available from 2017 onwards. Historical data before 2017 only includes Simpanan Konvensional rates.
caveat_ms: Dataset ini hanya merangkumi kadar dividen yang diumumkan oleh KWSP dan tidak mengambil kira sebarang variasi akaun individu disebabkan oleh sumbangan tambahan atau pengeluaran. Data Simpanan Shariah hanya tersedia dari 2017 dan seterusnya. Data sejarah sebelum 2017 hanya merangkumi kadar Simpanan Konvensional.

fields.name: Date
fields.description_en: The date representing the year for which the dividend rates are applicable, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
fields.description_ms: Tarikh yang mewakili tahun di mana kadar dividen terpakai, diformatkan sebagai YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: Simpanan Konvensional (Per Annum)
fields.description_en: The annual dividend rate for Simpanan Konvensional expressed as a percentage.
fields.description_ms: Kadar dividen tahunan untuk Simpanan Konvensional dinyatakan sebagai peratusan.

fields.name: Simpanan Shariah (Per Annum)
fields.description_en: The annual dividend rate for Simpanan Shariah expressed as a percentage. Available from 2017 onwards.
fields.description_ms: Kadar dividen tahunan untuk Simpanan Shariah dinyatakan sebagai peratusan. Tersedia dari 2017 dan seterusnya.
